document_data.name: Sirhan al-Din
document_data.mainbody: '''Sirhan al-Din''' was a [[janni]] and member of the [[Sword Dancers]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Cardsheets}}
document_data.Description: Sirhan stood over {{SI|6|ft}} tall. He had dark eyes, chestnut hair, and dusky skin.{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Holy Slayer Sourcebook|25}}
document_data.History: Sirhan was a resident of [[Sarahin]] from the time the jann first built that great fortress. He was completely loyal to the Sword Dancers.
document_data.Activities: Sirhan served as master of the hounds. He managed to capture and train two cheetahs who followed him wherever he went.
